alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued April 30 at 2:16AM EDT until May 01 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT /4 AM CDT/ MONDAY... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 5 to 8 feet expected in the surf zone. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Walton, Bay, Gulf, and Franklin County Beaches. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, from 5 PM EDT /4 PM CDT/ this afternoon to 5 AM EDT /4 AM CDT/ Monday. For the High Rip Current Risk, through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: People are urged to remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; South Walton
